title: Melee Weapons Attack & Magic Attack Sound Pack
description: Elevate combat in your game with 319 expertly crafted melee and magic attack sound effects. Perfect for RPGs, Medieval Warfare, and more
longDescription:
🔈View Sound List

🔈View Video Demo

"Dive into the epic clash of steel and sorcery with our 'Melee Weapons Attack & Magic Attack Sound Pack.' This comprehensive collection features 319 meticulously crafted sound effects designed to bring your RPG, Medieval Combat, Medieval Warfare, and Melee Combat games to life.

With 218 distinct weapon and melee attack sounds, ranging from the mighty swing of an axe to the elegant whoosh of a staff, you'll have a diverse array of choices to amplify your combat sequences. The library also includes bone-chilling sounds of battle, including gruesome splatters of blood and shattering bones, perfect for intensifying the realism of your game.

But that's not all. To infuse your magic combat scenes with elemental power, we've included 101 magical attack sounds encompassing Fire, Ice, Water, Wind, Poison, and Lightning spells. Unleash the fury of these elemental forces upon your enemies, and witness the immersive transformation of your game world.

Whether your game takes place in the heart of a sprawling medieval kingdom or in the midst of intense battlefield warfare, this sound pack provides a treasure trove of audio assets to enhance your players' experiences. Elevate your gaming project with 'Melee Weapons Attack & Magic Attack Sound Pack' and let the sonic symphony of combat captivate your audience.

This sound pack is a must-have resource for sound designers, indie game developers, and creators seeking to add depth, intensity, and authenticity to their projects. It's time to forge your path to gaming greatness with these expertly crafted soundscapes."
technicalDetails:
Audio file types: .Wav

Sample rate: 44,100Hz Sample Rate

Bit depth: 320Kbps Bit rate

Additional: Stereo

Do Sound Fx Loop: Yes

Windows and Mac: Yes

Support Dev Platform: Yes

-Dynamic sound

-Well organized
